== PanamaTeam ==

''Join us now and share the software; You'll be free, hackers, you'll be free.''

    http://www.stallman.org/

'''Content'''<<BR>>
The Panama Team advocates the use of ''Free'' (as Freedom) software and Ubuntu GNU/Linux in Panama.

This is done through CD Distribution, Team expansion and user-base support.

'''Esta pagina tambien esta en <nowiki>[[PanamaTeam|Español]]</nowiki>'''

=== What We Do ===

* Educate the public about ''Free'' (as Freedom) Software.
* Supply Ubuntu (CDs & CD images).
* Support Ubuntu Locally.
* Beta Test Software (Launchpad, KDE4, Amarok).
* <nowiki>[[PanamaTeamEN/Projects| More information in Projects]]</nowiki>
